hero.title: Transparency
hero.subtitle: Learn about our commitment to honesty and the current status of our projects

commitment.title: Commitment to Transparency
commitment.description: At Almare Foundation, we believe that trust is built through honesty. Our commitment is to keep the community informed about every step we take, from project planning to the execution of our activities.

currentStatus.title: Current Project Status Explanation
currentStatus.description: We are currently in the process of raising the necessary funds to launch our first emotional support and mental health programs and workshops. Every resource we receive will be used responsibly to fulfill our mission.

projects.title: Programs in Development
projects.description: Our mental health programs are being carefully designed to provide the best possible support to our community.
